QuestData.Title: The Tranquil Forest
QuestData.Description: Archmage Khadgar sent word about Val'sharah not long ago. It sounds like he has good news.$B$BYou should meet him on Krasus' Landing in Dalaran as soon as you are able.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Archmage Khadgar on Krasus' Landing in Dalaran.
QuestData.RewardText: <Archmage Khadgar smiles.>$B$BI rarely get to say this, but I have good news for you, $n.
